free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: The student will learn the key chemical and physical properties needed to understand  interfaces. The course will treat fundamental interactions (such as covalent, Coulomb, polar and dispersive interactions) from a molecular basis to the combined interaction, needed to understand interfacial phenomena. Special attention will be given to compounds and interfaces occurring in biological systems and the emerging utilization of interfaces in medical technologies and nano-science.
